RootTable.Filter: SELECT d.ea_guid AS CLASSGUID, d.diagram_type AS CLASSTYPE, 't_diagram' AS CLASSTABLE, d.name FROM t_diagram d WHERE d.package_id IN (#Branch#) AND d.name LIKE '<Search Term>%' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM t_diagramobjects do INNER JOIN t_object o ON do.object_id = o.object_id WHERE o.package_id IN (#Branch#) AND o.name = ltrim(d.name, '<Search Term> ')); #DB=COMMENT# Find the context diagrams that do not contain the classifier they claim to contain according to the name of the context diagram. This query is intended to be used in a model view, where the search term is fixed and valid only in a given language. #DB=COMMENT#
